jobDescription: Sr iOS Developer i.am+ was founded by innovator and musician will.i.am. We develop products for the connected lifestyle. At i.am+, we aim to create new products that combine fashion and technology in the evolving wearables segment. Our vision is to create a community of creatives and engineers that believe through music and technology as the first step, we can usher in a powerful new era built on artificial intelligence and a voice first user experience.
